meanings.definition: To add too much salt to something.
meanings.sent1: I always oversalt my soup by mistake.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to oversalt the pasta sauce.
meanings.sent3: Oops, I oversalted the popcorn again!
meanings.sent4: Her tears seemed to oversalt the wound in his heart.
meanings.sent5: The chef's tendency to oversalt made his dishes almost inedible.

meanings.sent1: The oversalt soup was hard to eat.
meanings.sent2: The fries were oversalt and not enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The oversalt chips made everyone pucker their lips.
meanings.sent4: The oversalt sea water stung his eyes.
meanings.sent5: The oversalt pretzels left a lingering taste in her mouth.
